a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball I

p.k: The Club / The Wand / The Ape / The Poltergeist When Gumball rejects “The Rejects Club” the rejects wreak their revenge. / Gumball and Darwin make their Dad believe in magic again. / Ms Simian sets out to “befriend” Gumball in order to win a Favourite Teacher Award. / Gumball and Darwin give Mr Robinson a home and end up saving his marriage.
